Package farmSim

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
farmSim.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
Farm object holds information about the state of the farm.
Version:
8/05/2020
Author:
James Harris, Manjeet Panwar

  • Constructor Details

    • Farm

      public Farm​(java.lang.String farmName, Farmer userFarmer, java.lang.String farmType)
      Initializes Farm. Sets some basic variables, Initializes arrayLists Sets farms attributes based on farm type
      Parameters:
      farmName - The name of the farm
      userFarmer - The Farmer of the farm
      farmType - The type of the farm

  • Method Details

    • getAnimalArrayList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Animal> getAnimalArrayList()
      Returns AnimalArraylist.
      Returns:
      AnimalArraylist

    • addNewAnimal

      public void addNewAnimal​(Animal animal)
      Adds a new animal to the animalArrayList. Does not check if adding new animal will go past maximum animals
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal object to add

    • isAnimalArrayFull

      public boolean isAnimalArrayFull()
      Determines whether the farm has space for more animals.
      Returns:
      True if space for more animals, false otherwise

    • getCropArrayList

      public java.util.ArrayList<Crop> getCropArrayList()
      Returns cropArrayList.
      Returns:
      cropArrayList

    • isCropArrayFull

      public boolean isCropArrayFull()
      Determine whether the farm has space for more Crops.
      Returns:
      True if space for more Crops, false otherwise

    • addNewCrop

      public void addNewCrop​(Crop crop)
      Adds a new crop to the farm. Also adjusts new crops growth rate by cropGrowthMutiplier
      Parameters:
      crop - The crop object to add

    • removeCrop

      public void removeCrop​(Crop crop)
      Removes crop object from farm. Also increases crops harvested
      Parameters:
      crop - The crop object to remove

    • animalArrayToString

      public java.lang.String animalArrayToString()
      Returns a list of the animalType on the farm in arrayList order.
      Returns:
      String of animal on farm

    • cropArrayToString

      public java.lang.String cropArrayToString()
      Returns a list of the cropType on the farm in arrayList order.
      Returns:
      String of crops on farm

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      Returns the money the farm has.
      Returns:
      Money

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney​(int money)
      Sets the amount of money the farm has.
      Parameters:
      money - The amount to set money to

    • deductMoney

      public void deductMoney​(int amount)
      Decreases farms money by amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to decrease money by

    • addMoney

      public void addMoney​(int amount)
      Increases farms money by amount. Also adjusts Farmers moneyScore by amount
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to increase money by

    • printFarmStatus

      public void printFarmStatus()
      Display the farms status. Including Money, a List of the users owned items, and for each crop/animal, its information Used by GameEnviroment for CommandLineInterface.

    • getItemsOfType

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsOfType​(java.lang.String type)
      Returns all the items from farms ItemArrayList that match the passed in type Used by GameEniroment for CommandLineApplication. Better Version below
      Parameters:
      type - The type of item to return
      Returns:
      ArrayList of items that match type

    • getItemsOfType

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsOfType​(java.lang.String[] types)
      Returns all the items from farms ItemArrayList that match the passed in types.
      Parameters:
      types - The list of types to be matched
      Returns:
      ArrayList of items that match the given types
